name: MariaDB + phpMyAdmin Installer
description: Installs and secures MariaDB, and sets up phpMyAdmin with optional DB creation and SSL.

name: Full Web Stack Installer
description: Installs NGINX or Apache, PHP, MariaDB, optional phpMyAdmin, SSL, and a coming soon page.

name: MyBB Forum Installer
description: Fully automated MyBB install with Apache, PHP, and MariaDB. Outputs credentials to a text file.
